title: Making iron
creator_credit: John Durst, Film Producers Guild and Merton Park
brief_description: Describes with the aid of animated diagrams the construction and operation of the blast furnace. Explains by simple formulae the chemical reactions, showing basic principles of separating iron from ore. The process of smelting and the two-way flow of the burden and hot gases is explained firstly in part, then as a whole, to stress the continuous nature of the operation.
